title: Orga LF Top/Jungle for SINN League Play-In next Split
body:
Hi there,

we are currently looking for a new top laner and jungler for our team. We are going to attend the play-ins for summonnersinn league and are considering looking into esl too.

The core of the team consists of three diamond players who have been playing together for over a year now. Looking for high dia/master players who want to build a reputation for themselves and are dedicated workers.

Add JGX for more details.
